variable.name: ASCSOURCE
variable.comment: Ascertainment Source This file has one row for every form 126 recording outcome(s). A participant may have more than one of these forms and one form may record several different types of outcomes. Only the first occurrence of each outcome is counted, e.g. Limiting the file to rows where DVT=1 will find a single row for each participant with a DVT outcome.

variable.name: DVT
variable.comment: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) DVT is adjudicated for HT participants only.

variable.name: PE
variable.comment: Pulmonary Embolism (PE) Defined as the first occurence of PE or a Death due to Pulmonary Embolism. PE is adjudicated for HT participants only. This file does not include PEs determined solely by the cause of death.

variable.name: DVTDX
variable.comment: Not collected on early versions of F126.
variable.value: DVT not caused by procedure within 60 days
DVT caused by procedure within 60 days

variable.name: DVTDISCH
variable.description: F126 Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) based on hospital discharge summary
variable.comment: DVT based on: hospital discharge summary with a diagnosis of deep vein thrombosis

variable.name: DVTVENOG
variable.description: F126 Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) based on positive findings on venogram
variable.comment: DVT based on: positive findings on a venogram

variable.name: DVTPLETH
variable.description: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) positive findings impedance plethysmography
variable.comment: DVT based on: positive findings using impedance plethysmography

variable.name: DVTDOPPL
variable.description: F126 Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) positive findings on doppler
variable.comment: DVT based on: positive findings on doppler duplex, ultrasound, sonogram, or other non-invasive test examination Not collected on early versions of F126.

variable.name: DVTISOTP
variable.description: F126 Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) positive findings on isotope
variable.comment: DVT based on: Positive findings on isotope scan

variable.name: DVTRPSRC
variable.description: F126 diagnosis Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) report source
variable.comment: Not collected on early versions of F126.

variable.name: PEWORKUP
variable.description: F126 Pulmonary Embolism (PE) work up done
variable.comment: Was a work up for pulmonary embolism performed? Not collected on early versions of F126.

variable.name: PEDX
variable.comment: Not collected on early versions of F126.
variable.value: PE not caused by procedure within 60 days
PE caused by procedure within 60 days

variable.name: PEDISCH
variable.description: F126 Pulmonary Embolism (PE) based on hospital discharge summary
variable.comment: PE based on: hospital discharge summary with a diagnosis of pulmonary embolism

variable.name: PEVENTPR
variable.comment: PE based on: high probability on ventilation-perfusion lung scan (exclude moderate, intermediate, or low probability on ventilation-perfusion lung scan)

variable.name: PEANGIO
variable.description: F126 Pulmonary Embolism (PE) positive pulmonary angiogram
variable.comment: PE based on: positive findings on pulmonary angiogram or spiral CT

variable.name: PEGE1DVT
variable.description: F126 Pulmonary Embolism (PE) based on >=1 Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) + PE signs/symptoms
variable.comment: PE based on: Diagnosis of deep vein thrombosis (DVT) based on >=1 DVT criteria, plus signs and symptoms suggestive of PE (e.g., acute chest pain, dyspnea, tachypnea, hypoxemia, tachycardia, or chest X-ray findings suggestive of PE)

variable.name: PEOTHER
variable.description: F126 Pulmonary Embolism (PE) based on other, including autopsy
variable.comment: PE based on: Other, including autopsy Not collected on early versions of F126.
